attributes.action: Arrange for a year of free credit report checks for 25 million Child Benefit recipients
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the scandal of the 25 million lost Child Benefit records, I think that the government should put an arrangement in place for all affected citizens to receive a free year's subscription to a credit checking agency such as Experian, so that they can monitor credit applications made in their name

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
